original_title: Ob Dirndl oder Lederhose - gejodelt wird ganz wild drauflos
overview: A Bavarian music band moves into a Berlin brothel for two months and extends the stay due to the excellent night service. To fully ensure physical well-being, a dumpling cook and a dairy cow enter the house.
title: Ob Dirndl oder Lederhose - gejodelt wird ganz wild drauflos
